question: Is the candidate solution-oriented? i.e. does NOT focus on problems but rather tries to reach solutions?
How hard-working is the candidate?
Does the candidate accept constructive feedback about his/her work, does he/she take responsibility for owns mistakes, admits them, accepts comments and and work on improving?
how far does the candidate show ownership towards the projects? E.g does he provide support when he is done from his commitment , does he try to deliver despite obstacles ?
How well does the candidate work with clients? Is the client satisfied? Can he gain his trust?
How professionally does the candidate behave?
How far the candidate follow project process?
How much trust do you have in the candidate's ability to make the right decisions?

How much trust do you have in the candidate's ability to perform a correct job if left alone? E.g. would he/she deliver rightly with minimum follow-up? Go in the right direction, delivers on time, and delivers high quality, etc.?
How well does the candidate handle stress? E.g. does he/she provide less quality if put under stress?
How well does the candidate collaborate and communicate with other employees , interface with clients and be a company Ambassador?
Rate the candidate's ability to solve NON-technical problems, e.g. team conflicts, spirit issues, overload, etc. & also contribute to solving team issues (process, plan, etc.)
How far the candidate is capable of maintaining good positive team spirit & help creating positive atmosphere for their work

How do you rate the candidate felixabilty  to share his knowledge with his colleagues?
Score indicate no of sessions he shared
Guidelines : Score indicates the number of lessons learnt shared
Did the candidate fill in all assigned survives on time and with needed quality if any?
When the business priorities change, how quickly does the candidate adjust to changing priorities?
How far does the candidate accept new assignments ? E.g assignments not directly related to his core competency.
How punctual is the candidate? E.g. comes to the office on time, attends the meetings on time, plan his vacations etc.
How much attention to detail does the candidate have? E.g. covers all the required details, ask the right questions early, fully understand the business. etc.
How do you rate the candidate's ability to bring new innovative ideas that support his team?
How often does the candidate meet his deadlines?
How do you rate the candidate level in UI development? E.G: HTML,CSS,etc..
How do you rate the candidate level in Front End development? E.G: Jquery, Javascript, Angualr,etc..

How do you rate the quality of the candidate's source code?
Guideline :  score should be with respect to  min X defect per US , where X <  team defect threshold
how far the candidate is keen to create reusable, scalable and maintaible solution?
Rate the candidate accuracy of code review
Rate the candidate's ability to solve technical problems
Rate the candidate ability to provide proper design for a problem
How do you rate the candidate's code documentation and Project technical documentation?

Rate the candidate's unit test business coverage
Guideline for TL: score represent % of modules that doesnâ€™t have auto unit test
Rate the candidate as fast learner

How far is the candidate up to date with  latest technology in his area of expertise?

Guidelines : Score indicate no of new update about technology  / business (rate according to the seniority of the member 5 = fair session, 8 =  good session, 10 =  excellent session)
Rate the candidate's ability to provide reliable estimation
How Far the candidate ensure delivery with high quality & applies the standard ways of ensuring that, e.g. code reviews, etc.
Rate the candidate ability to align and orchestrate the work of multiple platforms at the same time?
Rate the candidate overall picture understanding?
Rate the candidate's capability to set the right priorities
Rate the Candidate's ability to distribute the tasks among team members and follow-up on them effectively
Rate the candidate's ability to delegate the right tasks and keep the right tasks for him/her-self, in the right effective manner
How far  does the candidate prepare needed work for the next release effectively ? E.G : align with BE readiness , UI readiness, raise relevant risks, work closely with BA
How far  does the candidate Support Capability manager in leading capability by providing ideas, leading initiatives, team development planetc..
Did the candidate managed to c complete all mandatory  training on time as per development plan
Any other specific feedback about the candidate you want to share in free text?
